    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_53fb193f4fe35534ba6456e12189bee8a7067763</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ultrasound waves inside a good casting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ultraschall bewegt innerhalb eines guten 
Gußteiles wellenartig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les ultrasons ondulent à l'intérieur d'un bon 
bâti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ultrasound acena dentro de uma carcaça boa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'ultrasuono fluttua all'interno di buon pezzo 
fuso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύματα υπερήχου μέσα σε μια καλή ρίψη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ultrasonido agita dentro de un buen bastidor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows ultrasound waves travelling through the good casting which are received by the ultrasound detector for detection of flaws.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flaw detection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultrasound detector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultrasound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Ultraschallwellen, die 
durch das gute Gußteil fortpflanzen, welche durch den 
Ultraschalldetektor für Abfragung der Fehler empfangen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des vagues d'ultrasons 
voyageant par le bon bâti ce qui sont reçus par le détecteur 
d'ultrasons pour la détection des imperfections.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as ondas do ultrasound 
que viajam através da carcaça boa quais são recebidos pelo detetor 
do ultrasound para a deteção das falhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le onde di ultrasuono
che attraversano through il buon pezzo fuso quale sono ricevuti dal 
rivelatore di ultrasuono per rilevazione dei difetti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κύματα υπερήχου που 
ταξιδεύουν μέσω της καλής ρίψης που παραλαμβάνονται από τον 
ανιχνευτή υπερήχου για την ανίχνευση των ρωγμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las ondas del 
ultrasonido que viajan a través del buen bastidor cuáles son 
recibidos por el detector del ultrasonido para la detección de 
defectos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fehlerabfragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ultraschalldetektor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ultraschallwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">détection d'imperfection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">détecteur d'ultrasons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vagues d'ultrasons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deteção da falha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">detetor do ultrasound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas do ultrasound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rilevazione del difetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rivelatore di ultrasuono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">onde di ultrasuono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανίχνευση ρωγμών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανιχνευτής υπερήχου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κύματα υπερήχου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">detección del defecto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">detector del ultrasonido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ondas del ultrasonido</string>
          </keyword>
